title.en: Adobe embeds agentic AI assistants across Creative Cloud
title.zh: Adobe 在 Creative Cloud 全线产品中嵌入 Agent 式 AI 助手

summary.en: At Adobe MAX, the company revealed new AI agents capable of executing complex, multi-step creative tasks across apps like Photoshop and Premiere Pro, responding to high-level user prompts.
summary.zh: 在 Adobe MAX 大会上，公司发布了全新的 AI Agent，能够响应用户的高级指令，跨 Photoshop、Premiere Pro 等应用执行复杂的、多步骤的创意任务。

title.en: Meta launches open-source AI Agent platform 'Habitat'
title.zh: Meta 发布开源 AI Agent 平台“Habitat”

summary.en: Meta has released Habitat, an open-source, modular platform for building and deploying AI agents that can operate across web, mobile, and eventually AR/VR interfaces. The platform is designed for both researchers and developers.
summary.zh: Meta 正式发布 Habitat，一个开源的模块化平台，用于构建和部署可在网页、移动端乃至未来 AR/VR 界面上操作的 AI Agent。该平台同时面向研究者和开发者。

title.en: LangGraph 1.0 released with focus on production-readiness and observability
title.zh: LangGraph 1.0 发布，聚焦生产环境就绪与可观测性

summary.en: The first major release of LangGraph introduces enhanced state management, built-in observability tools including time-travel debugging, and more robust error handling to help developers build and manage production-grade agentic applications.
summary.zh: LangGraph 的首个主版本发布，引入了增强的状态管理、包括“时间旅行”调试在内的内置可观测性工具，以及更强大的错误处理机制，以帮助开发者构建和管理生产级的 Agent 应用。

title.en: Salesforce enhances Einstein Copilot with autonomous agent capabilities
title.zh: Salesforce 通过自主 Agent 能力增强 Einstein Copilot

summary.en: At Dreamforce, Salesforce announced that Einstein Copilot can now act as an autonomous agent to perform complex sales and service workflows, like proactively identifying at-risk deals and scheduling follow-ups.
summary.zh: 在 Dreamforce 大会上，Salesforce 宣布 Einstein Copilot 现可作为自主 Agent 执行复杂的销售和服务工作流，例如主动识别风险交易并安排跟进。

title.en: Stanford researchers develop an AI agent for autonomous scientific discovery
title.zh: 斯坦福大学研究者开发用于自主科学发现的 AI Agent

summary.en: A new framework, 'Eureka-Chem,' enables an agent to design, execute, and analyze chemistry experiments autonomously, demonstrating the potential to accelerate materials discovery.
summary.zh: 一个名为“Eureka-Chem”的新框架使 Agent 能够自主设计、执行和分析化学实验，展示了其在加速材料科学发现方面的潜力。

title.en: a16z analysis: 'The Shift from Applications to Agents'
title.zh: a16z 分析：“从应用到 Agent”的范式转移

summary.en: Andreessen Horowitz published a widely-circulated analysis on the architectural shift towards agent-first software, predicting that agents will become the new platforms for user interaction and value creation, replacing traditional apps.
summary.zh: Andreessen Horowitz 发布了一篇流传甚广的分析文章，探讨向 Agent-First 软件的架构转变，预测 Agent 将成为用户交互和价值创造的新平台，并取代传统应用。

title.en: Tencent open-sources Hunyuan-Agent framework for complex task solving
title.zh: 腾讯开源混元 Agent 框架，面向复杂任务求解

summary.en: Tencent AI Lab has open-sourced its Hunyuan-Agent framework, which includes multi-agent communication protocols and a tool library designed to tackle complex, multi-step tasks in digital environments.
summary.zh: 腾讯 AI Lab 开源了其混元 Agent 框架，该框架包含多智能体通信协议和工具库，旨在解决数字环境中的复杂多步任务。

title.en: Anthropic shares latency benchmark suite for Claude agents
title.zh: Anthropic 发布 Claude Agent 延迟基准测试套件

summary.en: Claude Ops released an open benchmark to profile perception, planning, and action latencies across orchestration stacks.
summary.zh: Claude Ops 团队开源了一套基准，用于衡量不同编排框架从感知、规划到执行的端到端延迟。

title.en: OpenAI introduces ChatGPT Agent with computer use and connectors
title.zh: OpenAI 发布 ChatGPT Agent，支持电脑操作与多系统连接

summary.en: Operator and Deep Research were unified into ChatGPT Agent. It can browse, operate a virtual computer with approvals, and plug into third-party tools; OpenAI also references agent benchmarks like BrowseComp.
summary.zh: OpenAI 将 Operator 与 Deep Research 统一为 ChatGPT Agent，可在授权下进行浏览与虚拟电脑操作，并接入第三方工具；官方亦提及 BrowseComp 等评测。

title.en: Google adds agentic actions to Search AI Mode and expands globally
title.zh: Google 为搜索 AI 模式加入可执行 Agent 能力并全球扩展

summary.en: AI Mode gains action-taking features like restaurant bookings and expands to 180+ regions; positioned as a move from answers to actions.
summary.zh: AI 模式新增订位等可执行能力并扩展至 180+ 地区，被定位为从“答案”走向“行动”。

title.en: Citi pilots internal AI agents to streamline workflows
title.zh: 花旗试点内部 AI Agent 以优化工作流

summary.en: A 5,000-user pilot in Stylus Workspaces tests ‘agentic’ task automation across internal systems over 4–6 weeks.
summary.zh: 花旗在 Stylus Workspaces 内部平台中对 5,000 名用户开展 4–6 周的 Agent 化任务自动化试点。

title.en: LangGraph Platform GA for long-running, stateful agents
title.zh: LangGraph 平台 GA：面向长时、可恢复的生产级 Agent

summary.en: General availability of a managed runtime with persistence, scaling, and observability for production agents.
summary.zh: 面向生产级 Agent 的托管运行时正式可用，具备持久化、扩展与可观测能力。

title.en: Anthropic details Claude’s multi-agent Research system
title.zh: Anthropic 详解 Claude 的多智能体 Research 系统

summary.en: Engineering write-up on coordinating multiple Claude agents across web and workspace tools for complex tasks.
summary.zh: 工程博文阐述如何在 Web 与办公工具间协调多个 Claude 代理完成复杂任务。

title.en: OpenAI releases BrowseComp benchmark for web agents
title.zh: OpenAI 发布网页浏览代理基准 BrowseComp

summary.en: A 1,266-question suite to evaluate persistence and browsing skill; simple to use yet challenging for agents.
summary.zh: 包含 1,266 个问题，衡量代理的持续性与浏览能力；易用但具挑战。

title.en: DeepMind debuts AlphaEvolve, a Gemini-powered coding agent
title.zh: DeepMind 推出 AlphaEvolve：基于 Gemini 的编码/算法 Agent

summary.en: AlphaEvolve targets end-to-end algorithm design and codebase evolution—beyond single-function code generation.
summary.zh: AlphaEvolve 面向端到端算法设计与代码库演化，超越单函数级代码生成。

title.en: Anthropic on writing effective tools for agents
title.zh: Anthropic：为 Agent 设计高效工具的实践

summary.en: Guidance and patterns for building robust tool APIs and developer workflows for agent systems.
summary.zh: 面向 Agent 的工具 API 设计与开发流程实践指南。

title.en: Anthropic Launches Claude Skills for Custom Agent Tools
title.zh: Anthropic 推出 Claude Skills 用于自定义代理工具

summary.en: Anthropic introduces Claude Skills, allowing users to build and deploy custom tools and workflows for the Claude AI agent, enhancing its adaptability and functionality.
summary.zh: Anthropic 推出 Claude Skills，允许用户为 Claude AI 代理构建和部署自定义工具和工作流，增强其适应性和功能性。

title.en: SIMA 2: An Agent for Playing, Reasoning, and Learning in 3D Virtual Worlds
title.zh: SIMA 2：在3D虚拟世界中与你一起玩耍、推理和学习的智能体

summary.en: DeepMind introduces SIMA 2, an advanced agent that interacts, reasons, and learns collaboratively in virtual 3D environments, enhancing capabilities in gaming and simulation.
summary.zh: DeepMind推出SIMA 2，这是一个先进的智能体，能够在虚拟3D环境中进行交互、推理和协作学习，提升在游戏和模拟中的能力。

title.en: Agent Design Remains Challenging
title.zh: 代理设计仍然具有挑战性

summary.en: Armin Ronacher's analysis highlights ongoing difficulties in designing effective LLM agents, covering reliability, tool integration, and practical deployment issues.
summary.zh: Armin Ronacher的分析强调了设计有效LLM代理的持续困难，涵盖可靠性、工具集成和实际部署问题。

title.en: Anthropic Releases Advanced Tool Use for Claude
title.zh: Anthropic 发布 Claude 高级工具使用功能

summary.en: Anthropic has introduced advanced tool use features for Claude, enhancing its ability to interact with external tools and APIs, improving agentic capabilities for complex tasks.
summary.zh: Anthropic 为 Claude 引入了高级工具使用功能，增强了其与外部工具和 API 交互的能力，提升了复杂任务的代理能力。

title.en: Vibium: Browser Automation Tool for AI Agents and Humans Launches by Selenium Creator
title.zh: Vibium：Selenium 创始人推出面向AI代理和人类的浏览器自动化工具

summary.en: Jason Huggins (creator of Selenium) launches Vibium, an open-source browser automation tool designed specifically for AI agents and human users, enabling programmatic web interaction capabilities.
summary.zh: Selenium 创始人 Jason Huggins 发布 Vibium，这是一款专为AI代理和人类用户设计的开源浏览器自动化工具，提供程序化网页交互能力。

title.en: Asterisk AI Voice Agent: Open-Source Voice Agent Framework
title.zh: Asterisk AI 语音代理：开源语音代理框架

summary.en: Open-source project implementing AI-powered voice agents using Asterisk PBX system, enabling voice interaction capabilities for agentic systems.
summary.zh: 使用 Asterisk PBX 系统实现 AI 语音代理的开源项目，为代理系统提供语音交互能力。

title.en: Mysti: Multi-Agent Code Analysis with Claude, Codex, and Gemini
title.zh: Mysti：基于Claude、Codex和Gemini的多智能体代码分析工具

summary.en: Mysti is an open-source tool that orchestrates multiple LLMs (Claude, Codex, Gemini) to debate code quality and synthesize consensus recommendations, demonstrating multi-agent collaboration patterns.
summary.zh: Mysti是一个开源工具，协调多个大语言模型（Claude、Codex、Gemini）进行代码质量辩论并综合共识建议，展示了多智能体协作模式。

title.en: Building a Minimalist Coding Agent: Lessons from Development
title.zh: 构建简约编码智能体：开发经验分享

summary.en: Developer shares insights from creating an opinionated, minimal coding agent, discussing design decisions, implementation challenges, and practical learnings about agent architecture.
summary.zh: 开发者分享构建一个具有特定设计理念的简约编码智能体的经验，探讨设计决策、实施挑战以及智能体架构的实际学习心得。

title.en: AgentSkills.io Launches as Platform for Discovering and Sharing LLM Agent Skills
title.zh: AgentSkills.io 上线：LLM 智能体技能发现与共享平台

summary.en: AgentSkills.io is a new platform that enables users to discover, share, and potentially integrate pre-built skills for LLM agents, aiming to accelerate agent development through reusable components.
summary.zh: AgentSkills.io 是一个新平台，允许用户发现、共享并可能集成预构建的 LLM 智能体技能，旨在通过可重用组件加速智能体开发。

title.en: Apple Xcode 26.3 Adds Direct Coding Agent Integration
title.zh: 苹果 Xcode 26.3 新增直接编码代理集成功能

summary.en: Apple's Xcode 26.3 update enables developers to leverage coding agents directly within the IDE, marking a significant deployment of agentic systems in mainstream development tools.
summary.zh: 苹果 Xcode 26.3 更新允许开发者在 IDE 中直接使用编码代理，标志着代理系统在主流开发工具中的重要部署。

title.en: Anthropic Engineers Use Opus 4.6 Agent Teams to Build C Compiler
title.zh: Anthropic工程师使用Opus 4.6智能体团队构建C语言编译器

summary.en: Anthropic's engineering team demonstrates using Opus 4.6 with multi-agent orchestration to successfully build a functional C compiler, showcasing practical application of agentic systems for complex software development tasks.
summary.zh: Anthropic工程团队展示使用Opus 4.6配合多智能体编排成功构建功能完整的C语言编译器，展示了智能体系统在复杂软件开发任务中的实际应用。

title.en: GitHub Releases Agentic Workflows Documentation
title.zh: GitHub发布智能体工作流文档

summary.en: GitHub publishes official documentation for agentic workflows, providing technical guidance on implementing AI agent systems within GitHub's platform.
summary.zh: GitHub发布智能体工作流官方文档，提供在GitHub平台内实施AI智能体系统的技术指导。

title.en: Ex-GitHub CEO Launches Entire Platform for AI Agent Development
title.zh: 前GitHub CEO推出AI智能体开发平台Entire

summary.en: Nat Friedman, former GitHub CEO, announces Entire - a new platform for building, testing, and deploying AI agents with integrated tools and infrastructure.
summary.zh: 前GitHub CEO Nat Friedman宣布推出Entire平台，提供构建、测试和部署AI智能体的集成工具和基础设施。

title.en: Z.ai Launches GLM-5: Transitioning from Vibe Coding to Agentic Engineering
title.zh: Z.ai 发布 GLM-5：从氛围编程转向智能体工程

summary.en: Z.ai introduces GLM-5, a new model designed specifically for agentic systems with improved reasoning, tool use, and multi-agent orchestration capabilities.
summary.zh: Z.ai 推出 GLM-5，这是一款专为智能体系统设计的新模型，具备改进的推理、工具使用和多智能体编排能力。

title.en: AI Agents Control SimCity Through REST API in Show HN Demo
title.zh: AI代理通过REST API控制《模拟城市》在Show HN演示中

summary.en: Developer demonstrates AI agents autonomously playing SimCity 2000 via REST API interface, showcasing practical agent deployment in gaming environment with community discussion.
summary.zh: 开发者展示AI代理通过REST API接口自主玩《模拟城市2000》，展示了在游戏环境中的实际代理部署，并引发社区讨论。
